docs.lead_paragraph: “The soldiers keep Dorothy in view. She carries the tripod, unsteadily, and an extra poncho for a bib.”

headline.seo: ‘A Short History of Women,’ by Kate Walbert

docs.lead_paragraph: I have read every one of the more than 600 responses to Emmie, the young woman - 22, single, unexpectedly pregnant and about to start a prestigious, difficult graduate program - who wrote asking for readers' advice on what she should do. Emmie tells me she has read every word, too.
docs.abstract: Thoughts on the responses to Emmie, the young woman - 22, single, unexpectedly pregnant and about to start a prestigious, difficult graduate program - who wrote asking for readers' advice.
docs.snippet: Thoughts on the responses to Emmie, the young woman - 22, single, unexpectedly pregnant and about to start a prestigious, difficult graduate program - who wrote asking for readers' advice.

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Sarah Palin of Alaska continued her assault on CBS's David Letterman on Friday morning in an interview on NBC's "Today" show, calling the late-night host's efforts to apologize for remarks about her daughter "a weak excuse" and saying they were "a degrading comment on all young women."
docs.abstract: The Alaska governor continues to denounce the late-night show host, calling his remarks about her daughter degrading for all young women.
docs.snippet: The Alaska governor continues to denounce the late-night show host, calling his remarks about her daughter degrading for all young women.

docs.abstract: For the last two months an anonymous blogger known as "April's Mom" -- an unmarried woman with staunch anti-abortion views -- told the Internet community about her pregnancy of a terminally ill child. It was all a lie.
docs.snippet: For the last two months an anonymous blogger known as "April's Mom" -- an unmarried woman with staunch anti-abortion views -- told the Internet community about her pregnancy of a terminally ill child. It was all a lie.

docs.lead_paragraph: A large study found the anti-nausea drug metoclopramide did not harm babies when given to women early in pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: If YouTube can illustrate how to solve a Rubik’s Cube, pick a lock and poach an egg, maybe it can also demonstrate how to give birth.
docs.snippet: If YouTube can illustrate how to solve a Rubik’s Cube, pick a lock and poach an egg, maybe it can also demonstrate how to give birth.

docs.lead_paragraph: 10 P.M. (MTV) 16 AND PREGNANT Six teenage mothers-to-be try to keep it together while coping with impending parenthood in this new documentary series. In this premiere episode the young women are introduced along with the challenges they will face. The series -- a collaboration by MTV, the National Campaign to Prevent Teen and Unplanned Pregnancy and the Kaiser Family Foundation -- also offers information on how to prevent unplanned pregnancy. Viewing guides are available for each episode, some of which show the young women giving birth. 7 A.M. (NBC) TODAYTiger Woods, above, is interviewed at the U.S. Open. Mark Consuelo is a guest. Other segments look at getting a job, outdor fun and a 12-year-old restaurant critic.
docs.snippet: 10 P.M. (MTV) 16 AND PREGNANT Six teenage mothers-to-be try to keep it together while coping with impending parenthood in this new documentary series. In this premiere episode the young women are introduced along with the challenges they will face....

docs.lead_paragraph: An anti-abortion leader says his group may try to buy the now-closed Wichita abortion clinic owned by a doctor who was shot to death last month. The leader, Troy Newman, the president of Operation Rescue, said on Wednesday that his group, which had long fought to close the clinic, was considering trying to buy the squat, beige building to perhaps turn it into a memorial museum, ''a tribute to the babies.''

headline.main: Opponent Of Abortion May Buy Closed Clinic
